class Color(spectrum, illuminant=None, white_point=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Color object.

Parameters

  • spectrum (Spectrum) – Spectrum of interest.

  • illuminant (Optional[Spectrum]) – Illuminant spectrum, by default None.

  • white_point (Optional[tuple[float, float]]) – White point expressed in u*, v* 1976 CIELUV coordinates.

property CCT_DC: tuple[unyt.array.unyt_quantity, float]¶

Compute correlated color temperature using the 1960 CIE color space.

Return type

tuple[unyt_quantity, float]

Returns

  • unyt.unyt_quantity – Correlated color temperature in Kelvin and distance to Planckian locus.

  • float – Distance to Planckian locus. If greater than 0.05, CCT may be unreliable.

property LMS: tuple[float, float, float]¶

Compute coordinates in LMS color space.

Returns

L, M, and S, color coordinates.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

property UVW: tuple[float, float, float]¶

Compute coordinates in 1964 CIEUVW color space.

Returns

U*, V*, and W* color coordinates.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

property XYZ: tuple[float, float, float]¶

Compute coordinates in CIE 1931 XYZ color space.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

Returns

  • float – X color coordinate.

  • float – Y color coordinate.

  • float – Z color coordinate.

property avt: float¶

Compute average visible transmittance.

Returns

Average visible transmittance.

Return type

float

property cri: float¶

Compute color rendering index.

Returns

Color rendering index.

Return type

float

property rgb: tuple[float, float, float]¶

Compute coordinates in linear RGB color space.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

Returns

  • float – Linear R color coordinate.

  • float – Linear G color coordinate.

  • float – Linear B color coordinate.

property sRGB: tuple[float, float, float]¶

Compute coordinates in sRGB color space.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

Returns

  • float – R color coordinate.

  • float – G color coordinate.

  • float – B color coordinate.

show(ax=None)[source]¶

Show color on sRGB display.

Return type

None

property uv: tuple[float, float]¶

Compute chromaticity coordinates in CIE 1960 color space.

Returns

u and v chromaticity coordinates.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

property uvprime: tuple[float, float]¶

Compute chromaticity coordinates in 1976 CIELUV color space.

Returns

u and v chromaticity coordinates.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

property xyY: tuple[float, float, float]¶

Compute chromaticity coordinates based on CIE 1931 XYZ color space.

Returns

x, y, and Y color coordinates.

Return type

tuple[float, float, float]

convert(unit, jacobian=True)[source]¶

Change variable of x-axis and apply appropriate Jacobian transformation.

Parameters

  • unit (unyt.Unit) – New x-axis unit.

  • jacobian (bool, optional) – If True, apply Jacobian to ordinate. By default True.

Returns

Converted spectrum.

Return type

Spectrum

integrate(xmin=None, xmax=None)[source]¶

Integrate spectrum.

Parameters

  • xmin (unyt.unyt_quantity, optional) – Lower integration limit. By default None.

  • xmax (unyt.unyt_quantity, optional) – Upper integration limit. By default None.

Returns

Integral of spectrum.

Return type

unyt.unyt_quantity

Type

scipy.interpolate.UnivariateSpline

Parameters
